original_title: 花のあすか組！２ ロンリーキャッツ・バトルロイヤル
overview: The story of Kuraku Asuka, a tough junior high student who gets involved with the gang scene in the Kabuki Chou Ichibangai, a rough area of Tokyo. Second OVA of "Hana no Asuka-gumi!" based on the popular girl's manga Hana no Asukagumi! (The Glorious Asuka Gang!) by Takaguchi Satosumi.
title: Hana no Asuka-gumi! 2: Lonely Cats Battle Royale
